== About Me ==
My name is Edward Karavakis and I'm a senior research fellow at CERN, the European Organisation for Nuclear Research in Geneva, Switzerland. I am working on the <nowiki>[[http://dashboard.cern.ch|Experiment Dashboard]]</nowiki> project for the LHC experiments at CERN.
